subject: 3 CGMs Committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs - reg.
text: HRa 7z @THrf 9ferarrut (Teq 9dev 8 RTHRf FART4, HRG TAFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Arqd4 T 7f-5 Qa 6, 7zr-10, &RGT, 7f fccft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Conciliation Committeel 2024 Policy Circular No.2.1.77/2024 dated 01st August, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD /conciliation/2021-Part(1)(Comp. No. 67745)} Sub: 3 CGMs Committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs reg: Four Nos of 3-CGM Committees were constituted vide NHAI Circular No. NHAI/CMD/Conciliation/2021-Part(1) (Comp. No. 67745) dated 18.11.2022, Policy Circular No_ 2.1.58/2023 dated 15.05.2023, Policy Circular No. 2.1.65/2023 dated 04.12.2023, Policy Circular No. 2.1.73 dated 03.05.2024 and Policy Circular no. 2.1.76/2024 dated 09.07.2024 to expedite the disposal of pending cases. 2_ Now, it has been decided that Sh: Ashish Kumar Singh, CGM (F) will replace Sh: Dhanesh Kumar, GM (F) in Committee No. 2 for all ongoing and future cases of these committees till further orders. Accordingly, the revised composition of 3 CGM Committees is as under: Committee-1 Committee-2 Committee-3 Committee-4 Sh. Navin Kumar , 1 Sh. C K Sinha, Sh_ La P Padhy, Sh. Amarendra CGM(T) CGM(T) CGM (T), Kumar , CGM(T) , ji. Sh. A K Jha, ji. Sh. Ashish Kumar ji. Sh_ Ashish Kumar ji. Sh.
